level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: ยง 13-301 Definitions. As used in this subchapter the following terms shall mean and include: 1. "Member." A person who was an officer, member or probationary member of the uniformed force of the department at the time when this section shall take effect. 2. "Board of trustees." The board of trustees provided for in section 13-302 of this subchapter.
